name: Scrapyard (TacoSteffe)
description:
Short action game where you fight other scrapyard robots.

Upgrade yourself with new weapons & increased health, armor & speed.

==== Controls ====

Movement:    W, A, S, D + Mouse

Fire Weapons:   Mouse Left & Right

Pickup new Weapons:   Q & E

==== Further info ====

 The game is meant to ramp up which it kinda does, but it's bland at the end of it.

If I had more time I would improve the general gameplay of the game and add some sort of "mini-boss" to it to spice things up.
